title: Russia’s self-destructive ‘new nobility’
summary_full: General Vladimir Alexeyev's flouting of state protocol prompts an existential question to Putin's authoritarian rule: Why should anyone care about the rules if the country’s top secret people do not?
summary_public: General Vladimir Alexeyev's flouting of state protocol prompts an existential question to Putin's authoritarian rule: Why should anyone care about the rules if the country’s top secret people do not?
